attributes.action: remove the 10mph speed limit on Lake Windermere
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please remove the 10 mph speed limit on Lake Windermere. Since the introduction in March 2005 lake users have no where to go to water ski. Lots of families are losing out on enjoying the fun. All the local businesses are losing out and even the Lake District National park is now having to review funding options for the lake due to the restriction

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "remove the 10mph speed limit on Lake Windermere."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13022.asp

Prime Minister's Office
